description: This is a blueprint for a Surgical Pathology Report document

diagnosis.instruction: Primary diagnosis from the pathology report

tumor_size.instruction: Size of the tumor in cm

mucosal_invasion.instruction: Description of mucosal invasion by the tumor

mitotic_count.instruction: Mitotic count per 50 high power fields

necrosis.instruction: Description of necrosis within the tumor

immunostains.instruction: List of immunostains performed and their results

medical_record_number.instruction: Unique medical record number of the patient

date_of_birth.instruction: Date of birth of the patient in MM/DD/YYYY format

accession_number.instruction: Unique accession number for the pathology report

procedure_date.instruction: Date when the procedure was performed in MM/DD/YYYY format

clinical_history.instruction: Brief clinical history provided for the patient

gross_description.instruction: Detailed gross description of the specimen

microscopic_description.instruction: Detailed microscopic description of the specimen

immunostains.instruction: Details of the immunostains performed and their results

comment.instruction: Any additional comments or interpretations by the pathologist

hospital_name.instruction: Name of the hospital where the pathology report was generated

hospital_address.instruction: Address of the hospital where the pathology report was generated
